author: franzoni
body:
backport

for V1 MC dpg/pog production campaign of 3 pull requests already in master / 930_pre1:

+ hadronic PF calib: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/19308 
+ egamma PF calib: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/19307 
+ pixel quality, geom fix, CSC ape fix: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/19525
title: had PF + em PF calibration and AlCa update for V1 MC (backport)
